name: The Last Seed (Aalto University - Game Design)
name_original: The Last Seed (Aalto University - Game Design)
description:
Controls : WASD/Arrow Keys to move :) Play as a single dandelion seed pod that floats through mysterious and perilous caverns on a journey to find it's way to the surface.

The game is based on a Flash game called "Soap Bubble".

Made by

Toom Tragel - Environmental Art / Level Design
Noora Heiskanen - Character Art / Narrative Design
Prabhav Bhatnagar - Programmer / Game Design
